name: ConvexCone.coe_closure
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝² : ContinuousAdd E
inst✝¹ : SMul 𝕜 E
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul 𝕜 E
K : ConvexCone 𝕜 E
⊢ Eq (↑K.closure) (closure ↑K)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_closure (K : ConvexCone 𝕜 E) : (K.closure : Set E) = closure K :=
  rfl

name: ConvexCone.mem_closure
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝² : ContinuousAdd E
inst✝¹ : SMul 𝕜 E
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul 𝕜 E
K : ConvexCone 𝕜 E
a : E
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem K.closure a) (Membership.mem (closure ↑K) a)
decl:
@[simp]
protected theorem mem_closure {K : ConvexCone 𝕜 E} {a : E} :
    a ∈ K.closure ↔ a ∈ closure (K : Set E) :=
  Iff.rfl

name: ConvexCone.closure_eq
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝² : ContinuousAdd E
inst✝¹ : SMul 𝕜 E
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul 𝕜 E
K L : ConvexCone 𝕜 E
⊢ Iff (Eq K.closure L) (Eq (closure ↑K) ↑L)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem closure_eq {K L : ConvexCone 𝕜 E} : K.closure = L ↔ closure (K : Set E) = L :=
  SetLike.ext'_iff

name: PointedCone.toConvexCone_closure_pointed
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace E
inst✝² : ContinuousAdd E
inst✝¹ : Module 𝕜 E
inst✝ : ContinuousConstSMul 𝕜 E
K : PointedCone 𝕜 E
⊢ (↑K).closure.Pointed
decl:
lemma toConvexCone_closure_pointed (K : PointedCone 𝕜 E) : (K : ConvexCone 𝕜 E).closure.Pointed :=
  subset_closure <| PointedCone.toConvexCone_pointed _
